hasMenuItem.name: Wasabi

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Mayo

hasMenuItem.description: Traditional fermented Korean side dish, bursting with spicy and tangy flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Sriracha

hasMenuItem.name: Tempura Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Tempura sauce is a traditional Japanese soy-based dipping sauce, often enhanced with a delicate balance of sweetness, designed to complement tempura dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet & Sour Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A harmonious blend of sweetness and acidity, typically made with sugar, vinegar, and fruit juices.

hasMenuItem.name: Unagi Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A dark, sweetened soy-based sauce, often used to complement sushi rolls and grilled dishes, enhancing their flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Tomato Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A versatile sauce made with blended tomatoes, often seasoned with herbs and spices to complement various dishes.

review.reviewBody: amazing food and great customer service. new favourite restaurant!!!

Portion size is extremely small for price. I ordered the Real Crab Sunomono and received the smallest amount of what looked like deep fried crumbs. I dont recommend this restaurant. California Roll was not good either.

the miso soup was awful, the salmon smelled fishy didn't eat it. I think it is bad, and the sunomo salad was brown. 
definitely not eatible
Chicken teriyaki was not good or cooked properly, California rolls werent good either and were falling apart.
Unfortunately I cannot recommend this restaurant.
